refnamediv.refpurpose: How to manage Scilab's complex variable read and write process using call_scilab

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This help describes how doubles and matrix of complex can be handle through the Call Scilab API.
There are several functions which can be used to read / write from the memory of Scilab. These functions are described in dedicated pages.
Note: Access to variables is done through api Scilab (named variable).
